maqras.text: 72|1|[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ba man vahj sudaast, ki guruhe az cinnijon [ʙa in Qur'on] gus faro dodaand, pas, guftand: «Be gumon, mo Qur'one sigiftovar sunidem
72|2|Ki ʙa rohi rost hidojat mekunad. Pas, mo ʙa on imon ovardem va hargiz kasero ʙo Parvardigoramon sarik qaror namedihem
72|3|Va in ki sa'nu azamati Parvardigoramon ʙas [azimu] ʙaland ast. U [hargiz ʙaroi xud] hamsaru farzande intixoʙ nakardaast
72|4|Va in ki safeh [-u nodon]-i mo [sajton] dar ʙorai Alloh taolo suxanoni noravoe meguft
72|5|Va mo [cunin] gumon mekardem, ki hargiz insu cin ʙar Alloh taolo duruƣ nameʙandand
72|6|Va in ki mardone az odamijon ʙa mardone az cinnijon panoh meʙurdand va [ʙad-in vasila] ʙar gumrohi va sarkasii eson meafzudand
72|7|Va in ki onon [kofiron] gumon mekardand – hamon guna ki sumo [cinnijon] mepindosted – ki Alloh taolo hec kasro [duʙora] zinda namegardonad
72|8|Va in ki mo osmonro custucu kardem, pas, onro pur az muhofizoni nerumand va tirhoi sihoʙ joftem
72|9|Va in ki dar [osmon] ʙaroi sunidan ʙa kamin menisastem, [ammo] aknun har ki ʙixohad ʙa gus ʙosad, tiri sihoʙe dar kamini xud mejoʙad
72|10|Va in ki mo namedonem, ojo ʙaroi ahli zamin sarre iroda suda, jo Parvardigorason xajru hidojati esonro xostaast
72|11|Va in ki dar mijoni mo afrode soleh va afrode nodurust, mo guruhhoe mutafovit [va gunogun] hastem
72|12|Va in ki mo jaqin dorem, ki hargiz nametavonem dar ruji zamin Allohro ocizu notavon kunem va hargiz ʙo gurez nametavonem, Uro notavon sozem [va rohi firore nadorem]
72|13|Va in ki mo hangome ki [suxani] hidojatro sunidem, ʙa on imon ovardem. Pas, har kase, ki ʙa Parvardigoras imon ovarad, na az nuqson meharosadu na az sitam [ʙim dorad]
72|14|Va in ki guruhe az mo musulmon va guruhe kofir [va zolim] hastand. Pas, har kas, ki islom ovarda, ononand, ki rohi rastagoriro custucu karda [va ʙarguzida]-and
72|15|Va ammo kofiron [va sitamgoron] hezumi [otasi] cahannam xohand ʙud
72|16|Va in ki agar onho ʙar rohi rost pojdori kunand, alʙatta, ʙo oʙi farovon seroʙason mekunem
72|17|To onhoro ʙo on [ne'matho] ʙiozmoem. Va har kas az jod [-u zikri] Parvardigoras ru ʙartoʙad, [Alloh taolo] uro ʙa azoʙe saxt giriftor mesozad
72|18|Va in ki masocid az oni Alloh taolo ast, pas, kasero ʙo Alloh taolo [ʙa parastisu jorixohi] naxoned
72|19|Va in ki hangome ki ʙandai Alloh taolo [Muhammad] qijom kard, to Uro ʙixonad [va iʙodat kunad], nazdik ʙud, ki [az izdihom ʙar girdi u] ʙar sari ham furu rezand»
72|20|[Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onho] Bigu: «Man tanho Parvardigoramro mexonam va kasero ʙo U sarik namesozam»
72|21|Bigu: «Be gumon, man nametavonam ʙa sumo zijone ʙirasonam va na xajru sude»
72|22|Bigu: «[Agar man niz ʙar xilofi farmonas raftor kunam] hec kas maro dar ʙaroʙari U himojat namekunad va panohgohe cuz U namejoʙam
72|23|[Vazifai man] Tanho iʙloƣe az coniʙi Alloh taolo va [rasonidani] pajomhoi ust. Va har kas az Allohu pajomʙaras nofarmoni kunad, ʙe gumon, otasi cahannam az oni Ust, covidona dar on xohad mond»
72|24|[Kori kofiron hamcunon idoma dorad] To zamone, ki on ciro ʙa onho va'da doda suda, ʙuʙinand. On goh xohand donist, ki ci kase jovaras notavontar va cam'ijatas kamtar ast
72|25|[Ej pajomʙar] Bigu: «Man namedonam, ojo on ci ki ʙa sumo va'da doda suda, nazdik ast jo Parvardigoram zamone [dur] ʙaroi on qaror medihad»
72|26|[Alloh taolo] Donoi ƣajʙ ast va hec kasro ʙar [asrori] ƣajʙi xud ogoh namesozad
72|27|Magar rasulone, ki ononro pisandida [va ʙarguzida] ast. Pas, ʙe gumon, az pesi ruji u va pusti saras nigahʙone [az faristagon ʙaroi muhofizat az vaj] megumorad
72|28|To ʙidonad, ki [pajomʙaron] risolathoi Parvardigorasonro iʙloƣ kardaand va [Alloh taolo] ʙa on ci nazdi onhost ihota dorad va har cizero ʙa adad ʙarsumurdaast
73|1|Ej comaʙaxudpecida
73|2|Saʙro – cuz andake – ʙa po xez [va iʙodat kun]
73|3|Nimae az onro jo andake az on kam kun
73|4|Jo andake ʙar [nisfi] on ʙiafzo va Qur'onro ʙo tartil [-u taammul] ʙixon
73|5|Jaqinan Mo ʙa zudi suxane sangin ʙar tu nozil xohem kard
73|6|Be gumon, saʙzindadori [ʙar nafs] dusvor ast va ʙaroi guftor [va nijois] munosiʙtar va ustuvortar ast
73|7|Va jaqinan tu dar ruz masƣulijati ʙisjor dori
73|8|Va nomi Parvardigoratro jod kun va tanho ʙa U dil ʙiʙand
73|9|[Hamon] Parvardigori masriqu maƣriʙ, ki ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz U nest. Pas, Uro korsoz [-u nigahʙoni xud] ʙarguzin
73|10|Va ʙar on ci [musrikon] megujand, sikeʙo ʙos va ʙa sevai naku [va soista] az onon duri kun
73|11|Va maro ʙo in takziʙkunandagoni ʙarxurdor az ne'mat voguzor va ʙa onon kame muhlat deh
73|12|Be gumon, nazdi Mo qajd [-u ʙandho]-i sangin va [otasi] duzax ast
73|13|Va taome gulugir va azoʙe dardnok
73|14|Ruze, ki zaminu kuhho ʙa larza darojad va kuhho [mutalosi savand va] hamcun tudai regi narm [ravon] gardand
73|15|Jaqinan, Mo pajomʙare ʙa suji sumo firistodem, ki ʙar sumo sohid [va guvoh] ast, hamon guna ki ʙa suji Fir'avn pajomʙare firistodem
73|16|On goh Fir'avn az on pajomʙar nofarmoni [va ʙo u muxolifat] kard va Mo uro ʙa saxti mucozot kardem
73|17|Pas, agar kofir saved, ci guna xudro [az azoʙ] dar amon medored, [dar] ruze, ki kudakonro pir mekunad
73|18|[Dar on ruz] Osmon sikofta mesavad [va] va'dai U, hatman, ʙa vuqu' mepajvandad
73|19|Be gumon, in [ojot] pand [-u husdore] ast, to har ki ʙixohad, ʙa sui Parvardigori xud rohe dar pes girad
